mapper.insert: INSERT INTO image ( id, origin_img_path, expand_img_path, session_id, created_at ) VALUES ( nextval('session_id_seq'), #{imageInfoVO.originFilePath}, #{imageInfoVO.expandFilePath},#{imageInfoVO.sessionId}, now() );
mapper.select: SELECT id, origin_img_path AS originFilePath, expand_img_path AS expandFilePath, session_id AS sessionId, created_at AS createdAt FROM image WHERE session_id = #{sessionId} ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 1
